sources.title: Explainable AI: Interpreting, Explaining and Visualizing Deep Learning
sources.synthesis: XAI requires traceability from predictions to evidence. Layer-wise relevance propagation and attention mechanisms enable transparency.

sources.title: Statistical Process Control for Data Drift Detection
sources.synthesis: Control charts detect distribution shifts. CUSUM and EWMA methods balance sensitivity and false positive rates.

sources.title: GraphRAG: Knowledge Graph Retrieval for Large Language Models
sources.synthesis: Graph-based retrieval augments LLM responses with structured knowledge. Traversal expands context beyond vector similarity.
